title: [再見康打] 卡利亞里 對 AC米蘭

replies.msg:
#ACMilan XI: Donnarumma; Calabria, Paletta, Gomez, Vangioni; Kucka, Locatelli, Mati Fernandez; Suso, Bacca, Honda

Subs: Storari, Zapata, Zucchetti, Bertolacci, Bonaventura, Gabbia, Montolivo, Pasalic, Zanellato, Cutrone, Lapadula, Ocampos
屌仔有無機落場踢幾腳
今場為左 honda 而睇

Fassone: "Donnarumma? Raiola is one of the best agents. I won't allow myself to discuss what he does."

Fassone: "Gigio for us is a pillar on which we want to build the team next year. We told him and his agent, We are making it clear."

Fassone: "When I look to Donnarumma I feel his desire to stay. What we cannot do is waiting we want to give Montella the team, we want to know if we have our goalkeeper or a goalkeeper with expiring contract."

Fassone: "Our times are faster than what can Raiola have. I'm sure we will find a solution, at the moment there isn't a planned meeting."

Fassone: "We do not want a goalkeeper with an expiring contract. We will make our assessments, I am confident."

Fassone: "We need to have plan B if things do not go as we hope. It's a plan that we are yet to develop because we are convinced that our project is ideal for Gigio."

Fassone: "Donnarumma? Raiola is one of the best agents. I won't allow myself to discuss what he does."

Fassone: "Gigio for us is a pillar on which we want to build the team next year. We told him and his agent, We are making it clear."

Fassone: "When I look to Donnarumma I feel his desire to stay. What we cannot do is waiting we want to give Montella the team, we want to know if we have our goalkeeper or a goalkeeper with expiring contract."

Fassone: "Our times are faster than what can Raiola have. I'm sure we will find a solution, at the moment there isn't a planned meeting."

Fassone: "We do not want a goalkeeper with an expiring contract. We will make our assessments, I am confident."

Fassone: "We need to have plan B if things do not go as we hope. It's a plan that we are yet to develop because we are convinced that our project is ideal for Gigio."
